Uses of Interface
biscotti.io.FileProcessor

  • Packages that use FileProcessor 
    Package Description
    biscotti.io
    Static utilities useful for working with Files, and system-dependent tasks.

    • Uses of FileProcessor in biscotti.io

      Methods in biscotti.io that return FileProcessor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <R> FileProcessor<R> FileProcessors.alwaysFalse()
      Returns a file processor whose processFile(File) method always returns false.
      static <R> FileProcessor<R> FileProcessors.alwaysTrue()
      Returns a file processor whose processFile(File) method always returns true.
      Methods in biscotti.io with parameters of type FileProcessor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Iterable<File> Files2.walkFileTree(File path, FileFilter filter, FileProcessor<?> processor)
      Processes and returns all the files and sub-directories in the specified path which satisfy the specified filter.
      static Iterable<File> Files2.walkFileTree(File path, FileProcessor<?> processor)
      Processes and returns all the files and sub-directories in the specified path.
